reply.text:
There's not much left actually.
I did have this expensive mint condition Sonic action figure.
I was planning to sell it on BootyBay™
But I seem to have lost it...

actions.value: Are you sure? I inserted disk 1.

reply.text: It's not the disk, it's you.
I know, it's not the nineties anymore...

actions.value: I'm selling these fine plastic action figures!

reply.text:
Me too!
Until I lost my merchandise...
Let me know if you find my Sonic action figure!
